name: bravado
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
courage that you show, especially by doing something unnecessary and dangerous, to make people admire you: act of bravado It was an act of bravado to tell his boss to resign. These are young men full of bravado.
More examplesFewer examplesMany actors are an odd mixture of humility and bravado.This was an act of bravado that almost went horribly wrong.It was foolish bravado to challenge him but she didn't care.There seems to be an element of bravado involved in the trade.
